description:
A typical morning at the convent, on the surface. Look a little deeper. Imagine our Mother Superior pierced in places God might never suspect. Imagine our young nun as not so innocent. Our Mother Superior discovers our postulant has been admiring her fellow sisters, and must pay for her sins.

Now imagine how we punish sinners, Tickling.

The tables are turned. Our postulant proves just how naughty she is. Imagine the nun’s surprise when she wakes up after a blow to the head and discovers she is tied up, spread-eagle to a cross, with only her habit on. Add some hot wax, and bad attitude, now let’s see who’s turn it is to beg for mercy in this erotic tale of tickling.
title: Converted To Tickling
